page.title: 13The village shop
page.content: The Village Shop is the most convenient shop in Weston.The shop sells a number of tinned foods, cheeses,crisps and sweets.The owners of the shop are very friendly to all their customers and know most of them very well.The shop has recently had a post-office area added where many people receive their Family Allowances and Pensions which which are sums of money from Govenment to provide for their family and their old age.The owners of the shop also live in the house adjacent to the shop.The shop is a self-service shop which means people can help them selves at their own pace from the shelves and take them to the counter to pay.
